flawed_nl_solution:
This week, 80 - 20 = <<80-20=60>>60 people watched the first game.
While 80 + 15 = <<80+15=96>>96 people watched the third game.
A total of 80 + 60 + 96 = <<80+60+96=236>>236 people watched the games this week.
Thus, 236 - 200 = <<236-200=36>>36 more people watched the games this week than last week.
#### 36

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 95, not 96. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
